name: magnum
description: This file contains details of the assets used template by magnum.

assets.name: template.bootstrap.style
assets.description: Bootstrap 5.3.3 CSS style. Must be placed in media/templates/site/magnum/css/bootstrap.min.css

assets.name: template.styles
assets.description: Primary css style. Must be placed in media/templates/site/magnum/css/template.css

assets.name: template.jquery
assets.description: jQuery 3.7.1 JS script. Must be placed in media/templates/site/magnum/js/jquery-3.7.1.min.js

assets.name: template.bootstrap.script
assets.description: Bootstrap 5.3.3 JS script. Must be placed in media/templates/site/magnum/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js

assets.name: template.lightbox
assets.description: Lightbox JS script. Must be placed in media/templates/site/magnum/js/lightbox.min.js

assets.name: template.prism
assets.description: Prism JS 1.30.0 script. Must be placed in media/templates/site/magnum/js/prism.js

assets.name: template.go_top
assets.description: JS script button up on jQuery. Must be placed in media/templates/site/magnum/js/go_top.js
